content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 10 areas of personnel concentration, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

"Divisions of rocket troops were defeated by 3 stations of electronic wrestling, in particular for two R-330s" residents "and 1 composition of enemy ammunition," the message reads.

We will remind, on the front per day 74 combat:The enemy continues to storm the Avdiiv and Novopavlovsky directions.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the Tavriysk direction the Russians were left without2 tanks, 7 BBM and Thor-M-2 missile system.
title: Aviation of Defense Forces caused 10 blows to the army of the Russian Federation
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. “The missile troops were inflicted ...
author: Army Inform
